trans-unit.source: A pathological HTTP/S daemon for testing and stressing clients.
trans-unit.target: 一个病态的HTTP/S守护进程,用于测试和给客户端施加压力。

trans-unit.source: pathod is now part of mitmproxy. This package does nothing but install mitmproxy.
trans-unit.target: pathod现在是mitmproxy的一部分。这个包除了安装mitmproxy之外,什么都不做。
